thing-type.label: Dry Contact/IR Interface
thing-type.description: An OpenWebNet BUS/SCS Dry Contact Interface or IR Interface. BTicino models: 3477/F428, IR 4610-4611-4640 etc.

parameter.name: where
parameter.label: OpenWebNet Address (where)
parameter.description: A "3" must be added before the address. Automation Dry Contacts 3N with N=[1-201]; example N=60 --> where="360". Alarm Dry Contacts and IR sensors 3ZN with Zone Z=[1-9], N=[1-9]; example Z=4, N=5 --> where="345"
